item.title: Gynecologic Surgery Delayed for Up to 3 Years in Canada
item.description: Women seeking gynecologic care in Canada often face barriers to access, such as long wait times and dismissive attitudes. Medscape Medical News

item.title: New HIV Prevention Drug Holds Promise for Australia
item.description: A twice-yearly injection could help Australia eliminate HIV, but experts are sounding the alarm over its prohibitive cost. Medscape Medical News

item.title: MCED Screening: What Patients Need to Know
